# File generated by Wizard 2.2205.6 on Dec 24, 2025.

# Jammer struct
# the variables of the Jammer struct are controlled
# by the JammerManager struct. The JammerManager has its
# own instance of a Jammer that it configures
script_struct Jammer
   script_variables
      string commType = "";
      double longitude = 0;
      # range is in nmi (nautical miles)
      double range = -1.0;
      bool isActive = false;
      bool isValid = false;
   end_script_variables
   
   # getters and setters for the variables above
   script void SetCommType(string aCommType){
      commType = aCommType;
   }
   end_script
   
   script string GetCommType(){
      return commType;
   }
   end_script
   
   script double GetLongitude(){
      return longitude;
   }
   end_script
   
   script void SetLongitude(double aLongitude){
      longitude = aLongitude;
   }
   end_script
   
   script double GetRangeNMI(){
      return range;
   }
   end_script
   
   script void SetRangeNMI(double aRange){
      range = aRange;
   }
   end_script
   
   #if range is 0 we consider it No jamming
   script double GetIsActive(){
      if (range == 0)
         return false;
         
      return isActive;
   }
   end_script
   
   script void SetIsActive(double aBoolean){
      isActive = aBoolean;
   }
   end_script

   script double IsValid(){
      return isActive;
   }
   end_script

end_script_struct

script Jammer ConstructJammer(string aCommType, double aLongitude,double aRangeNMI, bool aIsActive){
   Jammer jammer = Jammer();
   jammer.SetCommType(aCommType);
   jammer.SetLongitude(aLongitude);
   jammer.SetRangeNMI(aRangeNMI);
   jammer.SetIsActive(aIsActive);
   jammer.isValid=false;
   return jammer;
}
end_script
